job.title: Principal Data Scientist - 90297807 - Washington
job.description: ltstronggtyour success is a train ride awayltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtamtrak connects businesses and communities across the country and we move americas workforce toward the future we employ more than diverse energetic professionals in a variety of career fields throughout the united states the safety of our passengers our employees the public and our operating environment is our priority and the success of our railroad is the result of our employeesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtare you ready to join our teamltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltugtsummary of dutiesltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtthe data scientist works closely with business stakeholders to understand their goals and determine how data can be used to achieve those goals they design data modeling processes create algorithms and predictive models to extract the data the business needs and help analyze the data and share insights with peersltbrgtltbrgtthe data scientist is responsible for building standard practices and operating principles to develop a data science practice that rely on repeatable processes that employ standard tooling and structured analysis to achieve business resultsltbrgtltbrgtthe data scientist will also engage with process and data experts throughout amtrak including operations research subject matter experts statisticians and data analysts to ensure a unified approach to problem solvingltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtessential functionsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt formulates and leads guided multifaceted analytic studies against large volumes of dataltligtltligt interprets and analyzes data using exploratory mathematic and statistical techniques based on the scientific methodltligtltligt coordinates research and analytic activities utilizing various data points unstructured and structured and employ programming to clean massage and organize the dataltligtltligt experiments against data points provide information based on experiment results and provide previously undiscovered solutions to command data challengesltligtltligt leads all data experimentsltligtltligt coordinates with data engineers to build data environments providing data identified by data analysts data integrators knowledge managers and intel analystsltligtltligt develops methodology and processes for prioritization and scheduling of projectsltligtltligt analyzes problems and determines root causesltligtltligt works closely with all business units and engineering teams to develop strategy for long term data platform architectureltligtltligt adheres to quality standards and proceduresltligtltligt reviews modules for quality assurance and checks compliance with application architecture standards and service level agreementsltligtltligt defines development guidelines and standards to be utilized in software developmentintegrationltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtminimum qualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtms in data science or related field with years of relevant work experience or phd in related field and years of relevant work experienceltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtpreferred qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt phd in data science with years of experienceltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtcommunications and interpersonal skillsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtmust have excellent oral and written communication performance ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwe want your work at amtrak to be more than a job we want it to be a fulfilling experience where you find challenging and rewarding opportunities respect among colleagues competitive pay benefits that protect you and your family and a high performance culture that recognizes and values your contributions and helps you reach your career goalsltbrgtltbrgtall positions require preemployment background check verification a preemployment drug screen and proof of full vaccination against covid amtrak is committed to a safe workplace free of drugs and alcohol and performs preemployment substance abuse testing marijuana notwithstanding any statute ordinance regulation or other law that legalizes or decriminalizes the use or possession of marijuana whether for medical recreational or other use candidates who engage in the usage of marijuana will not be qualified for hire successful applicants for employment with amtrak must be fully vaccinated against covid by the date of hire as a condition of employment subject to requests for accommodation fully vaccinated means days have elapsed since receiving the second dose of the pfizer or moderna vaccine or days since receiving the johnson ampamp johnson injectionltbrgtltbrgtin accordance with dot regulations cfrltbrgtltulgtltligt amtrak is required to obtain prior drug and alcohol testing records for applicantsemployees intending to perform safetysensitive duties for covered department of transportation positions if an applicantemployee refuses to provide written consent for amtrak to obtain these
